May 14, 2024



Town Council Meeting May 2024
-----------------------------



Notice is hereby given that a Regular Meeting of the Town of Laguna Vista, Texas will be held Tuesday, the 14th day of May, 2024, at 6:00 pm., at the South Texas EcoTourism Center, 501W TX-100, Laguna Vista, TX 78578.
Pursuant to Texas Government Code sec. 551.127, one or more members of the Town Council may attend and participate via video conference.
Agenda found here:
<https://lvtexas.us/uploads/meeting_agenda/CM_Agenda_-5_15_24.pdf>
